articles.title: Ashwin withdraws from IPL to support family amid Covid crisis - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Star spinner Ravichandran Ashwin withdrew from the Indian Premier League on Sunday to support his family during the Covid-19 pandemic, dealing a significant blow to the glitzy tournament which is taking place despite the country battling rising death rates.
